corporate-trust.name: Corporate Trust
corporate-trust.description: Professional, trustworthy sounds for banking and finance applications
corporate-trust.prompt: Warm professional interface sounds, soft banking app chimes, muted corporate clicks, trustworthy

crypto-modern.name: Crypto Modern
crypto-modern.description: Clean, digital sounds for cryptocurrency and Web3 applications
crypto-modern.prompt: Clean digital minimal interface sounds, crisp modern app, subtle tech feedback, futuristic but understated

playful-delight.name: Playful Delight
playful-delight.description: Bright, friendly sounds for consumer and social applications
playful-delight.prompt: Bright friendly interface sounds, cheerful app feedback, bouncy micro-interactions, delightful

minimal-focus.name: Minimal Focus
minimal-focus.description: Ultra-subtle sounds for productivity and focus applications
minimal-focus.prompt: Ultra-subtle interface sounds, near-silent productivity app, barely perceptible feedback, zen-like

retro-digital.name: Retro Digital
retro-digital.description: 8-bit inspired sounds for games and nostalgic applications
retro-digital.prompt: 8-bit inspired interface sounds, pixel art game UI, chip-tune bleeps, nostalgic digital

premium-luxury.name: Premium Luxury
premium-luxury.description: Rich, refined sounds for high-end applications
premium-luxury.prompt: Rich refined interface sounds, deep velvet tones, premium high-end app, sophisticated
